title: How to Make a Mocha without a Coffee Machine

steps.headline: Make a small amount of coffee with only hot water.
steps.description: Get a small cup and fill about ⁄3 centimeter (0.3 in) of the cup with  coffee and hot water, no milk.

steps.headline: Next, put some milk in a jug ready to add to the coffee.
steps.description: Put 2 spoonful's of hot chocolate powder and stir it in the jug. Put it in the microwave for 2 minutes.

steps.headline: Add the hot chocolate from the jug to the coffee in the cup.
